attributes.action: Start a website to take note of everything voters want.
attributes.additional_details:
If a popular figure like the prime minister asked people to participate it could replace voting.

It could be combined with other things as a plan for our future post Brexit. like replacing the voting system so the current party stays in as long as a majority vote is not against them.

I heard that the secret services like to collect everything and analyse later, so even if we cant do anything useful with the data now we might be able to later with research. so it still might be worth doing.
attributes.background: It could be like a blank page where you simply type all the things you want instead of voting and they could be categorised for people to see.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We understand that you would like the UK Government to set up a website on which voters could make suggestions to Government. However, we're not sure what you mean by "it could replace voting" or how that would work.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
